item.title: Trump targets Minnesota's Somali community with harsh words and policies

item.title: Officials search for Georgia inmate who escaped from a hospital
item.description: Officials say they are searching for a Georgia inmate who escaped from a hospital and is considered armed and dangerous

item.title: Trump-backed Republican Matt Van Epps wins US House special election in Tennessee
item.description: Republican Matt Van Epps has won a special election in Tennessee for a seat in the U.S. House
